entry.title: Odessa UI Kit
entry.content: Odessa is a helpful kit for prototyping responsive websites and boosting up your design workflow in Sketch.
entry.summary: Odessa is a helpful kit for prototyping responsive websites and boosting up your design workflow in Sketch.

entry.title: Pintereso Jekyll Theme
entry.content:
Nectaria is a Free responsive WordPress theme for blogging, with a beautiful generous custom header, masonry layout, responsive and translation ready. A design that’s suitable for any kind of niche, Nectaria’s Premium design will impress your visitors.

entry.title: Dashboard Kit
entry.content: 130+ beautiful and modern modules for prototyping, design & developing amazing dashboard apps.
entry.summary: 130+ beautiful and modern modules for prototyping, design & developing amazing dashboard apps.

entry.title: Affiliates Jekyll Theme
entry.content: “Affiliates” is a blogging Jekyll theme for affiliate marketers. It has a clean, minimal, beautiful and modern look.
entry.summary: “Affiliates” is a blogging Jekyll theme for affiliate marketers. It has a clean, minimal, beautiful and modern look.

entry.title: Atomize Design System
entry.content: Atomize is a UI design framework that helps designers and developers design well-structured, scalable and more consistent interfaces for the web. It is based on Atomic design methodology which has atoms and molecules as reusable building blocks.
entry.summary: Atomize is a UI design framework that helps designers and developers design well-structured, scalable and more consistent interfaces for the web. It is based on Atomic design methodology which has atoms and molecules as reusable building blocks.

entry.title: Biscaya
entry.content: Biscaya is a Premium multipurpose WordPress theme built with Elementor.
entry.summary: Biscaya is a Premium multipurpose WordPress theme built with Elementor.

entry.title: Brake UI Kit
entry.content: Brake is UI Kit with more than 60 app screens in 12 categories. Each screen is fully customizable, exceptionally easy to use and carefully layered and grouped in Sketch app.
entry.summary: Brake is UI Kit with more than 60 app screens in 12 categories. Each screen is fully customizable, exceptionally easy to use and carefully layered and grouped in Sketch app.

entry.title: Capi Restaurant
entry.content:
Capi Restaurant UI Kit is a high quality pack of 40+ social app screens based on iOS 11 which will accelerate your design process and will help develop an outstanding experience.

100% Vector Based, so all screens can be easily resized to fit other iPhone screens. Dimensions 375x812 and 375x667.
entry.summary: Capi Restaurant UI Kit is a high quality pack of 40+ social app screens based on iOS 11 which will accelerate your design process and will help develop an outstanding experience.

entry.title: Creation Web UI Kit
entry.content: The Creation Web UI kit is the largest library you could ever find. Designing using it will definitely be enjoyable as we have every elements you need for you to customize. Each is fully editable and pixel perfect. Additionally, we have created both light and dark blocks so that your design will be way easier than it was. It is definitely the tool you need in your collection!
entry.summary: The Creation Web UI kit is the largest library you could ever find. Designing using it will definitely be enjoyable as we have every elements you need for you to customize. Each is fully editable and pixel perfect. Additionally, we have created both light and dark blocks so that your design will be way easier than it was. It is definitely the tool you need in your collection!

entry.title: Dashboard Kit
entry.content: Photoshop massive collection of fully customizable UI components, closely related to each other and combined on different levels, regarding systematic design principles. Ultimate tool to start designing in system or boosting up your working process at any stage, from prototyping to stylization.
entry.summary: Photoshop massive collection of fully customizable UI components, closely related to each other and combined on different levels, regarding systematic design principles. Ultimate tool to start designing in system or boosting up your working process at any stage, from prototyping to stylization.
